answers.answer: If it happened twice, I think you are best off to see a doctor - there are different things that can make you dizzy - and being that leg weakness to the extent your leaning (both times on the same side) - it doesn't quite sound like something that you'd want to self treat without medical attention.  I hope you find a solution and it's nothing serious.

question: I have had two episodes where I am walking and all of a sudden I become dizzy and my left leg becomes weak causing me to lean to the left like I'm going to tip over. Otherwise I am healthy. No high blood pressure or diabetes.
title: Unstable
